courseDetails.title: Evergreen Instagram Marketing Theories That Always Works
courseDetails.shortDescription: Ignite your Instagram with evergreen marketing strategies for explosive growth, authentic engagement, and higher sales.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Transform your approach to Instagram marketing with strategies that are built to last. Whether you’re looking to solidify your brand, boost engagement, or drive sustainable growth, Our Evergreen Instagram Marketing Theories That Always Works Course offers the insights and frameworks you need for enduring success.

In today’s fast-evolving digital landscape, chasing every feature update can leave you overwhelmed. This course distills Instagram marketing down to its core principles—the unchanging theories that drive results, regardless of algorithm tweaks or feature updates.

Designed as a theory-based journey, this course skips flashy screen recordings and dives deep into the fundamental concepts that every marketer, entrepreneur, or business owner needs to know.


So, What’s Inside?

Let’s check out some of the Module Highlights:

  • Getting Started with Instagram:

Grasp the unique advantages of the platform and develop a strategic approach that leverages Instagram’s marketing potential.

  • Profile Optimization:

Master the art of creating a compelling business profile that attracts and retains your target audience.

  • Aesthetic Feed & Content Creation:

Understand the principles behind creating engaging and visually appealing content that resonates with your brand identity.

  • Engaging Captions & Stories:

Learn how to craft captions and stories that drive action, using clear, proven theories that are immune to fleeting trends.

  • Instagram Lives, Hashtags & Analytics:

Dive into the tactics of real-time engagement, hashtag strategy, and data-driven decision making—all built on evergreen theories.

  • Advanced Strategies & Hacks:

Explore innovative yet timeless hacks that have consistently delivered results for leading brands.


Why This Course?

Evergreen Value:

This course isn’t about chasing every new update—it’s about understanding the immutable theories that underpin lasting success on Instagram. You’ll gain insights that remain relevant, ensuring your marketing strategies are built on solid ground.

Theory Meets Practice:

By emphasizing theory, you learn not just what to do, but why it works. This approach empowers you to adapt and innovate, even as Instagram evolves.

No Fluff, Just Facts:

Get direct, actionable knowledge without the noise. Every module is designed to equip you with practical insights that translate into measurable results.

Core Frameworks:

Learn the enduring strategies that underpin every successful Instagram campaign.

Deep Theoretical Insights:

Understand why these principles work and how to apply them to your business consistently.

Step-by-Step Modules:

Follow a well-structured curriculum from profile optimization to advanced engagement tactics.

Practical Applications:

Transform theory into actionable tactics that deliver real-world results.


Enroll Today

Start mastering the unchanging theories behind Instagram success.

Unlock the power of timeless marketing. Your evergreen journey begins here.
targetAudiences: Entrepreneurs & Small Business Owners.
Side Hustlers & Freelancers
Content Creators & Influencers.
Digital Strategists.
Marketers & Social Media Managers

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Tienda Online con Inteligencia Artificial
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una tienda online con Inteligencia Artificial de forma fácil y simple, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA TIENDA ONLINE CON LA AYUDA DE LA INTELIGENCIA ARTIFICIAL PARA VENDER TUS PRODUCTOS POR INTERNET?

Crear una tienda online con Inteligencia Artificial hace que todo sea más fácil y te ahorra tiempo y esfuerzo, que puedes utilizar para tareas más importantes. Si tu presupuesto no es muy alto, crear una tienda online con IA te ayuda a ahorrar dinero. Es más económico que contratar un desarrollador web.


El Creador de Sitios Web con IA de Hostinger es una herramienta online que utiliza inteligencia artificial para crear una tienda online personalizada desde cero. De esta manera, puedes generar una tienda online de forma más fácil y rápida. Adicionalmente, el creador web con IA de Hostinger ofrece herramientas incorporadas para que puedas hacer más modificaciones a tu tienda online.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA EL CREADOR DE SITIOS WEB CON IA DE HOSTINGER?


Es fácil. Solo tienes que describir tu negocio y elegir el diseño que más te guste y se adapte a lo que necesitas.

El creador con IA escribirá el contenido, utilizará imágenes libres de derecho y elegirá los colores y tipografías adecuados para ti, según tu descripción.

Una vez se genera tu tienda online, puedes personalizarla aún más con el editor de arrastrar y soltar. Modifica y agrega imágenes, videos, botones, textos y más.

Cuando termines de crear y personalizar tu tienda online, puedes publicarla en Internet.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su tienda online con Inteligencia Artificial, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su tienda online diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo obtener un dominio y hosting para crear tu tienda online con Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear tiendas online profesionales desde cero con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu tienda online de forma profesional.

  • Cómo crear el contenido de tu tienda online con la ayuda de la Inteligencia Artificial.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu tienda online.

  • Cómo subir tus propios productos a tu tienda online para venderlos por Internet.

  • Cómo recibir pagos en tu tienda online mediante tarjeta de crédito, débito y PayPal.

  • Cómo adaptar tu tienda online para dispositivos móviles (tablets y celulares).

  • Cómo publicar tu tienda online en Internet.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Tienda Online con Inteligencia Artificial", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear una tienda online con Inteligencia Artificial de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender en el creador de sitios web con IA de Hostinger.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca
targetAudiences: Personas Interesadas en crear su propia tienda online de forma profesional.
Personas que no sepan programar pero que quieran crear una tienda online profesional.
Emprendedores y personas que quieran vender por Internet.
Empresas y Startups que quieran aumentar las ventas de sus productos creando una tienda online.

courseDetails.title: SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Data Import; Descriptive Statistics; Charts, Variance and Regression Analysis for Research and Business Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: IBM SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis by MTF Institute


Become a data analysis expert with "IBM SPSS: A Practical Guide to Data Analysis." This course offers a practical, hands-on approach to mastering IBM SPSS, guiding you from importing raw data to confidently interpreting and presenting your results. Designed for both beginners and intermediate users, you'll learn essential SPSS techniques including data import, descriptive statistics, creating insightful charts and graphs, data transformation, exploring correlations and regression, comparing group means with t-tests and ANOVA, and an introduction to multivariate analysis. Crucially, you'll develop the skills to accurately interpret SPSS output, focusing on effect sizes and practical significance to communicate data-driven insights effectively. Enroll now and unlock the power of your data!


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 216 countries and has been chosen by more than 750 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Unlock the power of your data with this practical IBM SPSS course! Designed for beginners and intermediate learners, this course takes you step-by-step from importing your raw data into IBM SPSS to confidently interpreting and presenting your findings. You'll gain hands-on skills in essential SPSS techniques, enabling you to extract meaningful insights for your research, academic projects, or professional reports.

We'll start with the fundamentals: navigating the SPSS environment and efficiently importing data from various sources. You'll then master descriptive statistics to summarise and understand your data's basic characteristics. Learn to create compelling and informative charts and graphs to visualize patterns and trends.

This course goes beyond the basics, equipping you with essential data transformation methods to prepare your data for analysis. You'll delve into the world of relationships between variables, exploring correlations and regression. You'll also learn to perform t-tests and ANOVA to compare group means, and gain an introduction to powerful multivariate analysis techniques.

But this course isn't just about running the numbers. A core focus is on interpreting your SPSS output correctly. You'll learn to move beyond simply reporting p-values, and instead, focus on effect sizes, confidence intervals, and the practical significance of your results. This will enable you to tell a compelling and data-driven story.

By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with the SPSS skills and the interpretive expertise to confidently analyze data, communicate your findings effectively, and make data-backed decisions.
targetAudiences: Students, researchers, and professionals who need to analyze data for reports, theses, or business decisions.

You'll gain hands-on skills in essential SPSS techniques, enabling you to extract meaningful insights for your research, academic projects, or professional reports. You'll then master descriptive statistics to summarise and understand your data's basic characteristics. courseDetails.title: 30 Days of Angular: Build 30 Projects with Angular
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Angular by building interactive web applications
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s era, practical experience—not just theoretical knowledge—is what the industry values most. To succeed as a developer, you need a strong portfolio filled with meaningful projects that showcase your competences and problem-solving ability. That’s exactly what you'll gain from 30 Days of Angular.

This is not an average programming course. In this hands-on learning experience, you’ll create 30 fully functional web applications—each designed to teach you core concepts of the Angular framework. From simple apps like a profile card, counter, and calculator to more complex ones like a crypto chart, resume builder, and user management system, you’ll work on projects modeled after practical scenarios to help you gain relevant skills.

You’ll work with essential features such as components, directives, services, HTTPClient, pipes, and more, while also diving into advanced techniques with RxJS for managing asynchronous data. Most importantly, you’ll be learning by doing—one of the most effective ways to develop real-world skills that are valued across the industry.

Throughout the course, you’ll also build fun and interactive games like Guess the Number, Tic Tac Toe, Checkers, and Minesweeper to sharpen your logical thinking and problem-solving skills. These projects not only teach you to use the framework effectively—they also demonstrate that you can deliver functional solutions in realistic scenarios.

By the end, you won’t just have theoretical knowledge—you’ll have 30 practical projects that clearly demonstrate your capabilities. Your final project will be a professional portfolio, giving you a polished platform to present your work to potential clients, employers, or collaborators. With this website, you’ll be able to confidently showcase your skills and stand out from other developers.

Whether you’re just starting out or looking to enhance your skills, this course is designed to prepare you for real-world programming challenges. It’s not just about learning Angular; it’s about proving you can build things that work.

Let’s build exciting projects, create a portfolio you’re proud of, and learn the skills to stand out.

Note: This course uses Angular 19, but it does not cover every feature of the version.
targetAudiences: Aspiring Angular Developers & Students – Whether you're beginning your journey into web development or learning Angular as part of your studies, this course will help you deeply understand the framework through hands-on, practical experience.
Freelancers & Self-Taught Developers – Build a professional portfolio of Angular projects to showcase your skills and attract clients or potential employers.
Developers from other frameworks or Vanilla JavaScript – If you're experienced with frameworks like React or Vue, this course will help you transition to Angular seamlessly.
Everyone who wants to improve in web development — This course reinforces fundamentals like HTML, CSS, and frontend architecture concepts that are valuable across all frameworks.

courseDetails.title: Elementor IA: Crea una Web con WordPress y Elementor 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web con WordPress, Elementor IA y Elementor Pro, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS, ELEMENTOR IA Y ELEMENTOR PRO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


Elementor IA permite mejorar los contenidos de nuestro sitio web de manera sencilla. El asistente de escritura de IA está disponible en el área de texto de cada elemento, lo que nos permite generar texto original para nuestros sitios web en cuestión de segundos.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress, Elementor IA y Elementor Pro, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress, Elementor IA y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress, Elementor IA y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo instalar plantillas prediseñadas con Elementor Kits para comenzar a crear tu sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web con Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo publicar tu sitio web en Internet.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Elementor IA: Crea una Web con WordPress y Elementor", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 180,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress, Elementor IA y Elementor Pro de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!


Inscríbase ahora y empiece con su aprendizaje en nuestro curso. Hay herramientas interesantes, atractivas y nuevas que aprender con Elementor IA y Elementor Pro.

Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre el contenido del curso o algo relacionado con este tema, siempre puede publicar una pregunta en el curso o enviarme un mensaje directo.

¡Adelante, haz clic en el botón de COMPRAR AHORA y te veré en la lección 1!

Saludos,

Renato Yacolca
targetAudiences: Emprendedores y personas que deseen conseguir tráfico web y ventas en un sitio web.
Emprendedores y personas que deseen configurar un sitio web diseñado profesionalmente desde cero.
Emprendedores y personas que busquen comenzar una carrera en el nicho de creación de sitios web con WordPress y Elementor Pro.
Emprendedores y personas que quieran aprender a usar WordPress y Elementor Pro de forma profesional.

courseDetails.title: Code & Play: JavaScript Game Projects
courseDetails.shortDescription: Level Up Your JavaScript Skills Through 15 Real Game Development Projects
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s fast-paced tech world, mastering JavaScript is more than just memorizing syntax - it’s about building real, interactive experiences. And what better way to learn programming than by making games? With Code & Play, you’ll strengthen your programming skills through creativity, logic, and hands-on coding that’s actually fun.

This isn’t your typical tutorial-based course. In this immersive learning experience, you’ll build a collection of 15 playable games—each one crafted to teach you key JavaScript concepts while keeping you engaged. From classics like Rock-Paper-Scissors, Pong, and Snake to original projects like key matcher or memory card game, every project is a chance to sharpen your skills in a meaningful way.

You’ll work with real JavaScript fundamentals: variables, functions, loops, objects, arrays, and event listeners—all applied directly to build game mechanics and interactivity. You’ll also dive into slightly more advanced topics like collision detection, game state management, animations and drawing with the HTML5 Canvas API.

But this course is about more than just writing code. It’s about learning how to think like a developer -debugging issues, solving logic problems, and organizing your code in a clean, modular way. Every game is a challenge designed to stretch your problem-solving skills and reinforce your understanding of JavaScript through real feedback loops.

By the end, you won’t just know how JavaScript works—you’ll have a personal arcade of games you built yourself, and a strong portfolio of projects that demonstrate your abilities in an exciting, creative format.

Whether you're new to programming or looking for a fun way to level up your JavaScript, this course will help you build confidence, deepen your knowledge, and unlock a whole new way to learn.

Let’s code, play, and build something awesome - one game at a time.
targetAudiences: Web developers seeking to improve their JavaScript skills through creative and engaging games.
Students or self-taught coders wanting to apply programming fundamentals in real-world, interactive projects.
Anyone who finds traditional coding tutorials boring and wants to learn through play and experimentation.

courseDetails.title: Omnichannel Sales & Service Management: Professional Diploma
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Omnichannel Sales & Service Strategies to Boost Customer Experience, Drive Growth, and Increase Multichannel Sale
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s competitive marketplace, delivering a seamless customer experience across multiple channels is no longer optional—it's essential. This comprehensive course equips you with the skills and knowledge to design, implement, and manage effective omnichannel sales and service strategies that drive growth and enhance customer satisfaction.

What You'll Learn:

  • Omnichannel Fundamentals: Understand the principles of omnichannel strategies and their role in modern business.

  • Customer Journey Mapping: Master tools and techniques to analyze and optimize the customer journey across various touchpoints.

  • Sales Strategies for Success: Learn how to create cohesive sales plans that align with multichannel environments.

  • Service Excellence: Develop customer service strategies that ensure a seamless and consistent experience.

  • Technology & Tools: Explore the latest digital tools and platforms for omnichannel integration and performance tracking.

  • Metrics & Analytics: Discover how to measure success using key performance indicators (KPIs) and analytics.

Key Features:

  • Real-world case studies to showcase successful omnichannel strategies.

  • Practical exercises to apply your learning to real business scenarios.

  • Insights into current trends and best practices in omnichannel management.

  • Strategies to leverage social media, e-commerce, and traditional channels effectively.

Who Should Enroll?

This course is perfect for:

  • Sales and service professionals aiming to upgrade their skills.

  • Business owners and managers looking to implement omnichannel strategies.

  • Marketing and customer experience specialists seeking to drive growth and engagement.

  • Anyone aspiring to stay ahead in today’s digital-first business environment.

Join us to master the art of omnichannel sales and service management and become a leader in delivering exceptional customer experiences. Enroll now and take the first step toward transforming your career!

courseDetails.title: Elementor Kits: Crea una Página Web con Elementor Pro 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS, ELEMENTOR KITS Y ELEMENTOR PRO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


Los kits de plantillas de Elementor son plantillas de páginas disponibles como colecciones, centradas en un tema o tipo de sitio web específico. Los kits de plantillas se crean como un grupo de plantillas individuales para un sitio web específico.


Los creadores de sitios pueden utilizar kits de plantillas para páginas individuales de un sitio. Por ejemplo, un kit de plantillas de sitio web inmobiliario comprende plantillas para cada página que una empresa inmobiliaria convencional necesita y plantillas para componentes específicos, a saber, formularios de contacto , ventanas emergentes , pies de página, encabezados, etc.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo instalar plantillas prediseñadas con Elementor Kits para comenzar a crear tu sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

  • Cómo crear un formulario de contacto para tu sitio web con Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo publicar tu sitio web en Internet.
